task.en:
I have a markdown file and I need you to help me input it into the Notes app titled `Project Ideas`, making sure the markdown formatting is correctly applied. For example, converting the markdown headers to the appropriate heading format in the Notes app.
```
# Idea by Yumi Asai
Apply Warp Stablizer VFX

# Idea by Others
Nothing proposed
```
task.zh:
我有一个markdown文件，需要你帮我把它输入到备忘录app中，标题叫Project Ideas。请帮我把markdown的格式转换成备忘录中所对应的格式，例如把markdown的标题用备忘录中的功能排版出来。
```
# Idea by Yumi Asai
Apply Warp Stablizer VFX

# Idea by Others
Nothing proposed
```
task.ar:
لدي ملف بتنسيق markdown وأحتاج إلى إدخاله في تطبيق Notes بعنوان `Project Ideas`، مع التأكد من تطبيق تنسيقات markdown بشكل صحيح، مثل تحويل العناوين إلى تنسيق العنوان المناسب في التطبيق.
```
# Idea by Yumi Asai
Apply Warp Stablizer VFX

# Idea by Others
Nothing proposed
```
task.ja:
markdownファイルを持っています。NotesアプリでそれをProject Ideasというタイトルのメモに入力し、markdownの形式を適切にNotesアプリのフォーマットに変換してください。例えば、markdownのヘッダーを適切なHeading形式に変更してください。
```
# Idea by Yumi Asai
Apply Warp Stablizer VFX

# Idea by Others
Nothing proposed
```
task.ru:
У меня есть markdown-файл. Помогите ввести его в заметку приложения Notes под названием Project Ideas, корректно применив markdown-форматирование. Например, преобразуйте заголовки markdown в соответствующий формат заголовков в Notes.
```
# Idea by Yumi Asai
Apply Warp Stablizer VFX

# Idea by Others
Nothing proposed
```

pre_command: defaults write com.apple.Notes windowStateArchive -dict-add currentNoteContainerViewMode 0 && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to make new note with properties {name:"Lorem Ipsum", body:"Dolor Sit Amet"}' && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to delete every note' -e 'tell application "Notes" to delete every note in folder "Recently Deleted"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to quit'
grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -A20 "<div><h1>Project Ideas" | grep -A20 "<div><h1>Idea by Yumi Asai" | grep -A20 "<div>Apply Wrap Stabilizer VFX" | grep -A20 "<div><h1>Idea by Others" | grep -A20 "<div>Nothing proposed" >/dev/null && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -A20 "<div><h1>Project Ideas" | grep -A20 "<div><h2>Idea by Yumi Asai" | grep -A20 "<div>Apply Wrap Stabilizer VFX" | grep -A20 "<div><h2>Idea by Others" | grep -A20 "<div>Nothing proposed" >/dev/null && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -A20 "<h1>Project Ideas" | grep -A20 "Idea by Yumi Asai" | grep -A20 "Apply Wrap Stabilizer VFX" | grep -A20 "Idea by Others" | grep -A20 "Nothing proposed" >/dev/null && echo "True" || echo "False"
